021import dev.dejvokep.boostedyaml.YamlDocument;
022import dev.dejvokep.boostedyaml.block.implementation.Section;
023import net.tnemc.core.EconomyManager;
024import net.tnemc.core.TNECore;
025import net.tnemc.core.account.Account;
026import net.tnemc.core.account.holdings.CurrencyHoldings;
027import net.tnemc.core.account.holdings.HoldingsEntry;
028import net.tnemc.core.account.holdings.RegionHoldings;
029import net.tnemc.core.config.MainConfig;
030import net.tnemc.core.utils.Identifier;
031import net.tnemc.plugincore.PluginCore;
032import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.log.DebugLevel;
033import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.storage.Datable;
034import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.storage.StorageConnector;
035import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
036import org.jetbrains.annotations.Nullable;
037
038import java.io.File;
039import java.io.FileInputStream;
040import java.io.IOException;
041import java.math.BigDecimal;
042import java.util.ArrayList;
043import java.util.Collection;
044import java.util.Map;
045import java.util.Optional;
046import java.util.UUID;
047
048/**
049 * YAMLHoldings
050 *
051 * @author creatorfromhell
052 * @since 0.1.2.0
053 */
054public class YAMLHoldings implements Datable<HoldingsEntry> {
055
056  /**
057   * The class that is represented by the O parameter.
058   *
059   * @return The class that represents the parameter.
060   */
061  @Override
062  public Class<? extends HoldingsEntry> clazz() {
063
064    return HoldingsEntry.class;
065  }
066
067  /**
068   * USed to purge the objects of this datable.
069   *
070   * @param connector The storage connector to use for this transaction.
071   */
072  @Override
073  public void purge(final StorageConnector<?> connector) {
074    //This isn't required, it'll be deleted with the account.
075  }
076
077  /**
078   * Used to store this object.
079   *
080   * @param connector The storage connector to use for this transaction.
081   * @param object    The object to be stored.
082   */
083  @Override
084  public void store(final StorageConnector<?> connector, @NotNull final HoldingsEntry object, @Nullable final String identifier) {
085
086    //check if our file is in use.
087    final String file = "accounts/" + identifier + ".yml";
088    while(TNECore.yaml().inUse(file)) {
089      try {
090        Thread.sleep(1000);
091      } catch(final InterruptedException ignore) {
092      }
093    }
094
095    TNECore.yaml().add(file);
096
097    final File accFile = new File(PluginCore.directory(), file);
098    if(!accFile.exists()) {
099      try {
100        accFile.createNewFile();
101      } catch(final IOException ignore) {
102
103        PluginCore.log().error("Issue creating account file. Account: " + identifier, DebugLevel.OFF);
104        return;
105      }
106    }
107
108    PluginCore.log().inform("Saving holdings for: " + identifier, DebugLevel.STANDARD);
109
110
111    YamlDocument yaml = null;
112    try {
113      yaml = YamlDocument.create(accFile);
114    } catch(final IOException ignore) {
115
116      PluginCore.log().error("Issue loading account file. Account: " + identifier, DebugLevel.OFF);
117      return;
118    }
119
120    yaml.set("Holdings." + MainConfig.yaml().getString("Core.Server.Name")
121             + "." + object.getRegion() + "." + object.getCurrency().toString() + "."
122             + object.getHandler().asID(), object.getAmount().toPlainString());
123
124    PluginCore.log().debug("YAMLHoldings-store-Entry ID:" + identifier, DebugLevel.DEVELOPER);
125    PluginCore.log().debug("YAMLHoldings-store-Entry Currency:" + object.getCurrency().toString(), DebugLevel.DEVELOPER);
126    PluginCore.log().debug("YAMLHoldings-store-Entry AMT:" + object.getAmount().toPlainString(), DebugLevel.DEVELOPER);
127    try {
128      yaml.save();
129      yaml = null;
130    } catch(final IOException ignore) {
131      PluginCore.log().error("Issue saving account holdings to file. Account: " + identifier, DebugLevel.OFF);
132    }
133    TNECore.yaml().remove(file);
134  }
135
136  /**
137   * Used to store all objects of this type.
138   *
139   * @param connector The storage connector to use for this transaction.
140   */
141  @Override
142  public void storeAll(final StorageConnector<?> connector, @Nullable final String identifier) {
143
144    final Optional<Account> account = TNECore.eco().account().findAccount(identifier);
145    if(account.isPresent()) {
146
147      PluginCore.log().inform("Saving holdings for: " + identifier, DebugLevel.STANDARD);
148
149      //check if our file is in use.
150      final String file = "accounts/" + identifier + ".yml";
151      while(TNECore.yaml().inUse(file)) {
152        try {
153          Thread.sleep(1000);
154        } catch(final InterruptedException ignore) {
155        }
156      }
157
158      TNECore.yaml().add(file);
159
160      final File accFile = new File(PluginCore.directory(), file);
161      if(!accFile.exists()) {
162        try {
163          accFile.createNewFile();
164        } catch(final IOException ignore) {
165
166          PluginCore.log().error("Issue creating account file. Account: " + identifier);
167          return;
168        }
169      }
170
171
172      YamlDocument yaml = null;
173      try {
174        yaml = YamlDocument.create(accFile);
175      } catch(final IOException ignore) {
176
177        PluginCore.log().error("Issue loading account file. Account: " + identifier, DebugLevel.OFF);
178        return;
179      }
180
181      for(final Map.Entry<String, RegionHoldings> region : account.get().getWallet().getHoldings().entrySet()) {
182        for(final Map.Entry<UUID, CurrencyHoldings> currency : region.getValue().getHoldings().entrySet()) {
183          for(final HoldingsEntry entry : account.get().getHoldings(region.getKey(), currency.getKey())) {
184
185            yaml.set("Holdings." + MainConfig.yaml().getString("Core.Server.Name")
186                     + "." + entry.getRegion() + "." + entry.getCurrency().toString() + "."
187                     + entry.getHandler().asID(), entry.getAmount().toPlainString());
188          }
189        }
190      }
191
192      try {
193        yaml.save();
194        yaml = null;
195      } catch(final IOException ignore) {
196        PluginCore.log().error("Issue saving account holdings to file. Account: " + identifier, DebugLevel.OFF);
197      }
198
199      TNECore.yaml().remove(file);
200    }
201  }
202
203  /**
204   * Used to load this object.
205   *
206   * @param connector  The storage connector to use for this transaction.
207   * @param identifier The identifier used to identify the object to load.
208   *
209   * @return The object to load.
210   *
211   * @throws UnsupportedOperationException as this method is not valid for holdings.
212   */
213  @Override
214  public Optional<HoldingsEntry> load(final StorageConnector<?> connector, @NotNull final String identifier) {
215
216    throw new UnsupportedOperationException("load for HoldingsEntry is not a supported operation.");
217  }
218
219  /**
220   * Used to load all objects of this type.
221   *
222   * @param connector The storage connector to use for this transaction.
223   *
224   * @return A collection containing the objects loaded.
225   */
226  @Override
227  public Collection<HoldingsEntry> loadAll(final StorageConnector<?> connector, @Nullable final String identifier) {
228
229    final Collection<HoldingsEntry> holdings = new ArrayList<>();
230
231    if(identifier != null) {
232      final File accFile = new File(PluginCore.directory(), "accounts/" + identifier + ".yml");
233      if(!accFile.exists()) {
234
235        PluginCore.log().error("Null account file passed to YAMLAccount.load. Account: " + identifier, DebugLevel.OFF);
236        return holdings;
237      }
238
239      try {
240
241        try(final FileInputStream fis = new FileInputStream(accFile)) {
242
243          final YamlDocument yaml = YamlDocument.create(fis);
244
245          //region, currency, amount, type
246          if(yaml != null) {
247
248            //Holdings.Server.Region.Currency.Handler: Balance
249            if(yaml.contains("Holdings")) {
250              final Section main = yaml.getSection("Holdings");
251              for(final Object serverObj : main.getKeys()) {
252
253                final String server = (String)serverObj;
254                if(!main.contains(server) || !main.isSection(server)) {
255                  continue;
256                }
257
258                for(final Object regionObj : main.getSection(server).getKeys()) {
259
260                  final String region = (String)regionObj;
261                  if(!main.contains(server + "." + region) || !main.isSection(server + "." + region)) {
262                    continue;
263                  }
264
265                  for(final Object currencyObj : main.getSection(server + "." + region).getKeys()) {
266
267
268                    final String currency = (String)currencyObj;
269                    if(TNECore.eco().currency().find(currency).isEmpty()) {
270                      EconomyManager.invalidCurrencies().add(currency);
271                    }
272
273                    if(!main.contains(server + "." + region + "." + currency) || !main.isSection(server + "." + region + "." + currency)) {
274                      continue;
275                    }
276
277                    for(final Object handlerObj : main.getSection(server + "." + region + "." + currency).getKeys()) {
278
279                      final String handler = (String)handlerObj;
280                      final String amount = yaml.getString("Holdings." + server + "." + region + "." + currency + "." + handler, "0.0");
281
282                      //region, currency, amount, type
283                      final HoldingsEntry entry = new HoldingsEntry(region,
284                                                                    UUID.fromString(currency),
285                                                                    new BigDecimal(amount),
286                                                                    Identifier.fromID(handler)
287                      );
288
289                      PluginCore.log().debug("YAMLHoldings-loadAll-Entry ID:" + entry.getHandler(), DebugLevel.DEVELOPER);
290                      PluginCore.log().debug("YAMLHoldings-loadAll-Entry AMT:" + entry.getAmount().toPlainString(), DebugLevel.DEVELOPER);
291                      holdings.add(entry);
292                    }
293                  }
294                }
295              }
296            }
297          }
298        }
299      } catch(final IOException ignore) {
300
301        PluginCore.log().error("Issue loading account file. Account: " + identifier, DebugLevel.OFF);
302      }
303    }
304    return holdings;
305  }
306}
